Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory98.png'}
{3: 'Putting on the heavy cloak and the tailor-made mask Changyu passed you, the two of you approach the heart of the abandoned dock.'}
{3: 'You enter a small, half-collapsed room under the countless watchful eyes of the guards.'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Wait there. Bossman will be with you in a sec.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The man in guard attire directs you further into the room.'}
{3: 'Changyu dismisses the guard offhand. Pushing open the door, he steps in and finds one of the fallen stone walls to sit on.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Come, sit. I bet he's gonna take a while.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He lowers his voice and gestures toward the flat stone surface next to him.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "What are you afraid of? I don't bite!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Take a break.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You sit down by his side. Changyu grins and leans closer.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "In a second, the old coot in charge of this place will barge in with two of his guards. Just keep your head down and don't say a word.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'His face is now next to yours as he whispers in your ears the specifics of his plan.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Your costume belongs to a mole from the black market, but he wasn't close with the group here on the dock.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'His hand gently brushes your cloak, making sure the microchip is secured within the interlining.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "As long as you have the cloak and the token with you, no one's gonna notice a thing.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As he finishes the sentence, Changyu falls unusually quiet for a moment, before putting on a self-deprecating smile.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Do you trust me?', 4: '1'}
{2: "I'll trust a friend.", 3: '28', 4: 'Not much of a choice here.', 5: '29'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: '(Chuckles) A friend...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "That's... pretty cruel of you, isn't it?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He turns to give you a good, long look, his gaze unraveling the costume that cloaks you.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Y'know, I never noticed...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He reaches out, gently lifting the hood that has been covering your face.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'There\'s a pretty face underneath, isn\'t there? People would pay good money for you back... "there."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'There?', 3: '38', 4: "What's with the compliment?", 5: '38'}
{3: 'Changyu ignores your question. He just... smiles, and stares, before reaching for your face.'}
{2: '(Stop him)', 3: '41', 4: '(Let him touch you)', 5: '42'}
{3: 'You go ahead and grab his hand, but the moment your hands meet, a piercing sting penetrates your arm.'}
{3: 'Changyu tenderly caresses your cheek, his fingertips moving lower and lower... until they stop by your neck.'}
{3: 'All of a sudden, a piercing sting penetrates where he touches you.'}
{3: 'Your body begins to numb, your vision getting blurry.'}
{3: "You try to activate Lee's beacon, but your body gives in and falls before you can send the signal."}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Hey, be careful.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before you know it, Changyu is holding your defenseless body in his arms.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "You're gonna hurt yourself if you fall down like that.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Desperate to react, you struggle to catch your breath. Your shoulders are slowly lowered onto a piece of soft fabric.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "You wouldn't believe me if I told you. Not yet, anyway.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Changyu's voice comes and goes like ocean waves in your half-conscious state."}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "I promise I'll explain everything once it's over.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Hm? Relax, the drug I gave you wasn't that powerful to begin with. You'll wake up in no time.", 4: '1'}
{3: "As your grip on Changyu's shirt collar loosens, the heart rate monitor on your chest buzzes, signaling a countdown."}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Hey, we'll get busted if your heart keeps beating like that!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Trust me, 【kuroname】!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before the countdown is over, his voice fades away along with your vision, and your world fades to black.'}
